Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_open_3D_provider

The function AIL_open_3D_provider opens the specified M3D provider for playback of 3D sounds.

U32 AIL_open_3D_provider(
  HPROVIDER m3d
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the 3D library to open.

Returns

0 if the provider was successfully opened. Otherwise, use AIL_last_error to obtain the open error description.

Discussion

Use AIL_enumerate_3D_providers to obtain the M3D handle to pass to this function.

To determine if a given 3D provider will operate (for example, to see if EAX is installed), you must try to open it with this function. That is, the AIL_enumerate_3D_providers function will always return an M3D provider handle, even if the underlying 3D technology is not available.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_close_3D_provider, AIL_enumerate_3D_providers, AIL_last_error
Related Basic Types: HPROVIDER, U32
